channel.title: Database on Sylvain Verly
channel.description: Recent content in Database on Sylvain Verly

item.title: Nuodata
item.description: I founded Nuodata.io: a SaaS platform and open source open source project. It is based on PostgreSQL and Node.js. I am responsible for the development and the architecture of the project. nuodata-db-api nuodata-server http://nuodata.io The goal is to use tables and views as your API endpoints, for CRUD operations. The goal is to shift a lot of development to the database to save time and have a more reliable data and system.
